item.title: 中国万科首只上市商业地产信托基金首日早盘下跌
item.description: 周二，中国万科首款公开发售的商业地产投资产品在早盘交易中跌幅高达 3%，反映出在房地产市场长期低迷的情况下，市场对这家中国第二大开发商持谨慎态度。【原文：China Vanke's first public commercial real estate investment products fell as much as 3% in early trade on their debut on Tuesday, reflecting caution towards China's second-largest developer amid a prolonged property market downturn.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，日元在本周震荡开局后摇摆不定
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市走高，投资者在等待一系列经济数据、企业盈利和美国联邦储备委员会的政策会议，而日元在疑似干预将其从 34 年低点拯救出来一天后略微走软。【原文：Asian stocks inched higher on Tuesday as investors awaited a slew of economic data, corporate earnings and the U.S. Federal Reserve's policy meeting, while the yen was slightly weaker a day after suspected intervention rescued it from 34-year lows.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示，中国工厂活动以14个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 周二的一项民间调查显示，受新出口订单稳健回升的推动，中国制造业活动在4月份以14个月来最快的速度扩张，这对于仍在努力实现强劲复苏的经济来说是一个令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at the fastest pace in 14 months in April, driven by a solid uptick in new export orders, a private survey showed on Tuesday, an encouraging sign for an economy still struggling to mount a robust recovery.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份工厂活动增速放缓
item.description: 周二进行的一项官方工厂调查显示，中国 4 月份制造业活动扩张速度放缓，表明这一庞大的行业在第二季度初失去了一些发展势头。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at a slower pace in April, an official factory survey showed on Tuesday, suggesting some loss of momentum for the sprawling sector at the start of the second quarter.】

item.title: 日元在疑似干预后坚持大幅上涨，美联储成为焦点
item.description: 周二，日元兑美元汇率保持稳定，前一天大幅上涨，交易商称这是日本当局疑似干预引发的走势。【原文：The yen held its line against the dollar on Tuesday after making sharp gains the previous day in moves that traders said were sparked by suspected intervention by Japanese authorities.】

item.title: 4 月份中国非制造业活动增速放缓
item.description: 周二的一项官方调查显示，中国 4 月份非制造业活动增速放缓，这可能是由于南方地区的恶劣天气对建筑和服务业造成了干扰。【原文：China's non-manufacturing activity expanded at a slower pace in April, an official survey showed on Tuesday, likely due to disruption caused to construction and services businesses by adverse weather in the southern region.】

item.title: 电脑配件制造商罗技第四季度销售额增长，两年多来首次实现季度增长
item.description: 罗技国际公司（Logitech International）周二表示，该电脑外设制造商在第四季度的销售额有所增长，结束了在经历了大流行病带动的繁荣之后长达两年半的销售下滑。【原文：Logitech International increased its sales during its fourth quarter, the computer peripherals maker said on Tuesday, snapping two-and-a-half years of sales downturns after a pandemic-driven boom.】

item.title: 投资者关注以色列-加沙停战谈判和美国美联储政策审查，原油下跌
item.description: 周二早盘，在开罗举行的以色列-哈马斯停火谈判帮助平息了市场对中东冲突扩大的担忧之后，石油价格有所回落。【原文：Oil edged down in early trade on Tuesday after Israel-Hamas ceasefire talks in Cairo helped quell market fears of an expanded conflict in the Middle East, while worries about the outlook for U.S. interest rates weighed on the market.】

item.title: 日本 3 月工厂产出环比增长 3.8
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 3 月份工厂产出环比增长 3.8%，而市场预测中值为增长 3.5%。【原文：Japan's factory output rose 3.8% in March from the previous month, versus the median market forecast for a 3.5% rise, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 三星称人工智能将推动下半年技术需求增长
item.description: 三星电子周二表示，预计下半年人工智能需求将保持强劲，从而推动存储芯片和科技设备的销售，该公司第一季度营业利润增长了 10 倍多。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday it expected demand for artificial intelligence to hold strong in the second half, driving sales of memory chips and tech devices, as it reported a more than 10-fold rise in first-quarter operating profit.】

item.title: 日本 3 月失业率持平于 2.6
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 3 月份的失业率为 2.6%，与 2 月份持平。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in March was unchanged at 2.6% compared to February, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国要求到 2029 年新车必须配备紧急制动系统
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周一表示，到 2029 年 9 月，几乎所有在美国销售的新乘用车和卡车都必须安装自动紧急制动系统。【原文：Nearly all new passenger cars and trucks sold in the United States will be required to have automatic emergency braking systems by September 2029, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Monday, saying that the rule will save at least 360 lives annually and prevent at least 24,000 injuries.】

item.title: 最高货币外交官神田表示，日本外汇管理机构已做好 24 小时准备
item.description: 日本最高货币外交官神田正人（Masato Kanda）周二表示，日本当局已准备好 "24 小时 "处理外汇事务，同时再次拒绝就财政部是否在一天前干预支撑日元汇率发表评论。【原文：Japan's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda said on Tuesday that authorities were ready to deal with foreign exchange matters "24 hours", while declining again to comment on whether the finance ministry had intervened to prop up the yen a day earlier.】

item.title: Preqin 称第一季度多策略对冲基金发行量下滑
item.description: 数据提供商 Preqin 的数据显示，第一季度新发行的多策略对冲基金在新基金中所占比例不到十分之一，低于 2023 年最后一个季度的约四分之一。【原文：New multi-strategy hedge fund launches accounted for less than one in 10 of new funds in the first quarter, down from about one in four in the last quarter of 2023, according to data provider Preqin, a sign that investors witnessing higher market volatility might be seeking less risky prospects.】

item.title: 资金紧张的中国城市难以支付购房补贴
item.description: 艾米-王（Amy Wang）指望着中国东部城市潍坊当局承诺的 10 万元人民币（约合 1.38 万美元）补贴来装修她两年前购买的公寓。但她还在等这笔钱，还没来得及搬进去。【原文：Amy Wang was counting on a 100,000 yuan ($13,800) subsidy promised by authorities in the eastern Chinese city of Weifang to fit and furnish an apartment she bought two years ago. Still waiting for the money, she is yet to move in.】

item.title: 连锁超市 Coles 收入增长 3.4
item.description: 澳大利亚 Coles 集团周二公布第三季度收入增长，原因是通胀降温的迹象有助于推动其门店主要杂货商品的销售。【原文：Australia's Coles Group on Tuesday reported a rise in third-quarter revenue, as signs of cooling inflation helped drive sales of key grocery items at its stores.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，NBC 计划出价约 25 亿美元从 TNT 获得 NBA 转播权
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司计划平均每年投资约 25 亿美元，用于转播美国国家篮球协会的一揽子比赛。【原文：Comcast's NBCUniversal is planning to invest an average of about $2.5 billion a year to broadcast a package of National Basketball Association games, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美元因 160 日元而反弹，特斯拉在中国的喜悦
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒将从两家欧洲交易所摘牌
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc. said on Monday it would delist its shares from two European exchanges, following a review of the listings.】

item.title: 恩智浦半导体预测第二季度利润高于预期，因工业需求复苏
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semicductors NV）周一预计第二季度利润将高于预期，原因是其工业和移动客户的库存修正有所缓解，有助于抵消电动汽车需求放缓导致汽车客户收入下降的影响。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV forecast second-quarter profit above estimates on Monday, as easing inventory corrections at its industrial and mobile customers helped offset decelerating revenue from automotive customers due to slowing EV demand.】

item.title: 联合健康首席执行官称黑客利用 Citrix 漏洞入侵
item.description: 美国最大的医疗保险公司联合健康本周将在众议院的一个小组会议上作证，黑客利用私营 IT 公司 Citrix 软件的一个安全漏洞，于 2 月 12 日入侵了联合健康的技术部门，该软件允许员工远程访问他们的台式电脑。【原文：Hackers broke into UnitedHealth's tech unit on Feb. 12 by exploiting a security vulnerability in software from private IT company Citrix that allows employees remote access to their desktop computers, the largest U.S. health insurer will testify before a House panel this week.】

item.title: 巴西政府将成立委员会以启动南美一体化项目
item.description: 巴西一位高级官员周一表示，巴西政府将很快成立一个由规划部主持的部际委员会，以启动南美一体化项目。【原文：Brazil's government will soon create an interministerial commission chaired by the Planning Ministry to unlock projects for integration in South America, a top official said on Monday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙首席执行官鲍勃-巴基什卸任
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周一表示，鲍勃-巴奇什（Bob Bakish）将辞去首席执行官一职，此举正值该媒体公司考虑 Skydance Media 首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）的收购要约之际。【原文：Paramount Global said on Monday Bob Bakish would step down as CEO, in a move that comes as the media company considers a takeover offer from Skydance Media chief David Ellison.】

item.title: 西南航空推出延误补偿计划
item.description: 西南航空公司推出了一项航班延误赔偿计划，作为交通部就该公司 2022 年 12 月假期航班延误事件达成的 1.4 亿美元和解协议的一部分。【原文：Southwest Airlines has launched a delay compensation program as part of a $140 million Transportation Department settlement over the airline's December 2022 holiday meltdown.】

item.title: 独家：不可能食品公司首席执行官称，无论是否进行首次公开募股，公司都将筹集现金
item.description: 用大豆生产肉类替代品的 Impossible Foods 公司首席执行官彼得-麦吉尼斯（Peter McGuinness）周一告诉路透社记者，该公司正在瞄准 "流动性事件"，其中可能包括在未来两三年内公开募股，因为替代肉类正在努力赢回善变的消费者。【原文：Impossible Foods, which makes meat alternatives from soy, is targeting a "liquidity event" that could include a public offering in the next two to three years, CEO Peter McGuinness told Reuters on Monday, as alternative meats fight to win back fickle consumers.】

item.title: WeWork 与债权人达成和解，拒绝 Neumann 出价
item.description: 共享办公空间提供商 WeWork 周一宣布与次级债权人达成和解，并从高级贷款人处获得新的现金注入，继续推进破产交易，拒绝联合创始人兼前所有者亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）提出的 6.5 亿美元收购要约。【原文：Shared office space provider WeWork announced on Monday a settlement with its junior creditors and a new cash infusion from its senior lenders, moving ahead with a bankruptcy deal that rejects a $650 million offer from co-founder and former owner Adam Neumann.】

item.title: 分析师上调评级后，苹果股价上涨 3
item.description: 伯恩斯坦兴业银行集团（Bernstein Societe Generale Group）的一位知名分析师将苹果公司的股票评级上调至 "跑赢大盘"，指出在人工智能生成更新的帮助下，手机替代品的销售前景看好，苹果公司的股票周一上涨了 3%。【原文：Shares in Apple Inc were up 3% on Monday after a well-known analyst at Bernstein Societe Generale Group upgraded the stock to an "outperform" rating, pointing to the prospects for phone replacement phone sales with help from generative artificial intelligence updates.】

item.title: 经销商数据显示，特斯拉加州注册量连续第二个季度下降
item.description: 加州新车经销商协会的数据显示，2024 年第一季度加州特斯拉汽车的注册量下降了约 8%，这是连续第二个三个月下降。【原文：Registrations of Tesla vehicles in California fell about 8% in the first quarter of 2024 for the second consecutive three-month period, according to data from the California New Car Dealers Association.】

item.title: 纽约市广播公司将年度股东大会推迟两周举行
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）已将其年度股东大会推迟两周至 6 月 5 日。【原文：New York Community Bancorp has pushed back its annual shareholders meeting by two weeks to June 5.】

item.title: 报告称，在 2024 年剩余时间内，全球上游行业将达成价值 1,500 亿美元的交易
item.description: Rystad Energy 公司的分析师在一份报告中说，在今年剩余时间里，全球上游产业可能会再发生价值 1,500 亿美元的交易，重点将转向二叠纪盆地以外的美国页岩油田。【原文：The global upstream industry could see dealmaking worth another $150 billion throughout the remainder of the year, with focus shifting to shale plays in U.S. other than the Permian Basin, analysts at Rystad Energy said in a report.】
